attributes.action: establish a Motorists Charter setting service level standards for the repair of pot holes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Put in place a national website for the reporting of pot holes, and establish and enforce local and county councils to effect temporary and/or permanent repairs within strict time limits. A temporary repair should be compulsory within 24 hours of the problem being reported.

Funding should come from existing revenue from road users: road tax, council tax, fuel duty, road / bridge / tunnel tolls, speeding fines, parking fines, VAT on fuel, VAT on cars, congestion charges, vehicle first registration fees and benefit-in-kind taxes for company cars.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to establish a Motorists Charter setting service level standards for the repair of pot holes.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=MotoristCharter
